      class  Statement<T extends Statement<T>>

      Design Notes:
      Statement don't know semantic context.

      Fields in io.odysz.transact.sql with type parameters of type Statement 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ArrayList<Statement<?>> Statement.before 
      protected ArrayList<Statement<?>> Statement.postate
      Use this to make post updates etc have the same context with the main statement.
      Methods in io.odysz.transact.sql with parameters of type Statement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T Statement.before(Statement<?> postatement)
      Add setaments before this statement'sql been generated.
      T Statement.post(Statement<?> postatement)
      Add post semantics after the parent statement, like add children after insert new parent.
      Side effect: the added post statement's context is changed - to referencing the same instance for resolving, etc.
      Method parameters in io.odysz.transact.sql with type arguments of type Statement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T Statement.post(ArrayList<Statement<?>> posts)
      Wrapper of post(Statement).
